name: CURT 55580 Vehicle-Side Custom 4-Pin Trailer Wiring Harness
short_description: Plugs into vehicle tail light assembly to provide a 4-way flat socket
Simple plug-and-play design eliminates the need for cutting or splicing
4-way flat output connects tail lights, brake lights and turn signals
Equipped with tail light converter for vehicle-trailer compatibility
Constructed with SMT circuitry for better performance and durability
product_description: If your vehicle is not equipped with wiring for towing a trailer, CURT custom wiring is the ideal solution. A custom wiring harness -- also called a T-connector -- is a simple, plug-and-play electrical device that plugs into your automotive electric system and provides a standard, universal trailer wiring connection. This is done using two or more vehicle-specific, OEM-compatible connectors to plug into the taillight assembly, eliminating the need for cutting, splicing and soldering during installation. Custom wiring harnesses are made vehicle-specific, and while they are not available for all vehicles, they do offer one of the fastest, easiest and most secure ways to wire a vehicle for towing. This particular plug-in harness provides a 4-way flat connector socket and is designed to be a custom wiring harness to fit certain years of the Toyota Sienna (to verify your vehicle compatibility, see application info). It comes with all necessary wiring components to establish a reliable trailer wiring connection, as well as a dust cover to keep the connector clean when not in use. You have a picture in mind of your next destination -- maybe it's the boat landing at your favorite fishing spot, maybe it's a campsite that overlooks one of nature's masterpieces, or maybe it's the next big jobsite. However, turning that picture into a reality takes more than just daydreaming. It takes a solid connection and the right amount of power. CURT custom wiring is made with some of the most sophisticated technology in the industry and is designed to install with ease, giving you a long-lasting electrical connection for your towing hitch setup.
product_details: Best Sellers Rank #611,963 in Automotive ( See Top 100 in Automotive ) #964 in Towing Hitch Wiring

name: CheeMuii 15 FT Trailer Wiring Harness Kit Heavy Duty 7 Way Trailer Cord with 7 Pin Trailer Plug and Junction Box Kit Premium Light and Brake Wiring Wires for Trailer RV
short_description: DOUBLE PRONG TRAILER PLUG: Cheemuii 7 pin trailer plug uses the premium copper double prong to replace the poor single prong, and the outer wrap is made of weatherproof and durable material to ensure a longer service life

JUNCTION BOX: The junction box is equipped with 7 color-coded terminals and wires, which can easily identify the corresponding functions of the wires and facilitate wiring. Strong junction boxes are waterproof and dust resistant to increase the service life of trailer cords

COPPER POWER CORD: The 7 way trailer wire is made of high-quality copper and has a long service life. And has excellent electrical and thermal conductivity, to ensure the normal use of car lights in the process of driving (such as turn signal and brake lights, etc.)

DETAILED WIRING INSTRUCTION: CheeMuii trailer cords use 7 color-coded wires, and the color code adopted is suitable for most RV trailer wiring standards, but as there are some differences between trailer manufacturers, we have updated the detailed instructions, please read them carefully before use. Please refer to the wiring instructions and connect cables according to the color and function of the wires to avoid errors
WIDE APPLIATION: Suitable for trailers, RVs, campers, caravans, food vans and other towed vehicles. Perfectly connected taillights, brake lights, reverse lights, turn signals and auxiliary power

name: 8ft 7 Way Trailer Plug Cord with 7 Gang Junction Box, 7 Pin Trailer Wiring Harness, Heavy Duty 7-Pin Trailer Cord Wire Cable with Waterproof Junction Box
short_description: 【Organize Trailer Wiring】This 7-way trailer wiring harness kit supplies a fast and simplified way for wires connection, keeping all your trailer wiring in order

【Easy Wiring】7 color-coded wires for easy identification, provides a fast and simplified way for wires connection for wiring left/right turn light, brake signal lamp, reverse light, tail light, etc. Note: Please read the wiring diagram carefully to connect cable
【Flexible Connection】The cord provides plenty of extra length for an easy installation. Soft and rugged PVC housing ensures flexibility to wire it from the front to the rear of your car
【Versatile Applicaiton】Perfect for connecting tail, brake, reverse, turn signals, and auxiliary power of your trailers, RVs, campers, caravans, food vans, and other towed vehicles
【Solid Built】7-way copper blade double pin molded into a heavy duty plug, high quality ABS junction box is waterproof, dustproof, flameproof and corrosion resistant for a long lifespan

name: 7 Way Trailer Wire – Heavy Duty 14 Gauge 7 Pin Trailer Wiring Harness Kit with Color-Coded PVC Jacket – Flexible 7 Conductor Insulated Cable for RV, Camper, Truck, Boat, Utility Trailers (50 Feet)
short_description: 【High-Performance 7 Way Trailer Wire】: This 50FT 7 wire trailer wire uses high-quality 14 gauge stranded Copper Clad Aluminum (CCA) conductors for enhanced power delivery. Compatible with all standard 7 pin trailer wiring harness setups in 12V trailer systems.

【Durable & Flexible PVC Jacket】: The insulated trailer wire harness 7 wire is wrapped in a rugged PVC outer jacket that resists oil, moisture, and abrasion. Designed to remain flexible in extreme weather, from scorching heat to -20°C cold.

【Color-Coded for Easy Installation】: The trailer wiring harness kit 7 pin includes seven clearly marked wires (Green, Yellow, White, Brown, Blue, Black, Red) that match SAE standards, making it easy to connect tail lights, brakes, turn signals, and reverse functions.

【Versatile 7 Way Trailer Wiring Harness Kit】: Ideal for RVs, campers, horse trailers, utility trailers, food trucks, and more. This 7 way trailer wiring harness kit works for both professional installs and DIY replacements.
【Reliable Length & Hassle-Free Setup】: Includes a 50FT 7 pin trailer wiring harness, perfect for long trailers or custom setups. Easy to cut, strip, and route—suitable for any trailer wiring project.

name: CURT 56459 Vehicle-Side Custom 4-Pin Trailer Wiring Harness, Fits Select Nissan Rogue
short_description: EASY TO INSTALL. No cutting! No splicing! This trailer wiring harness kit plugs into existing factory wiring on your vehicle and equips it with a standard, rear 4-pin trailer wiring connector for plugging in and towing a trailer

STANDARD CONNECTOR. This plug-in 4-flat trailer wiring can be used to connect trailer tail lights, brake signal lights and turn signals. 4-way trailer light wiring is popular on a variety of trailers, adding versatile towing options for your vehicle
VEHICLE-SPECIFIC. This aftermarket, vehicle-trailer wiring harness is designed for select years of the Nissan Rogue
RELIABLE POWER. This 4-way trailer wiring harness is built with surface mount technology. This type of circuitry generates less heat, optimal light intensity and durable performance

DUST COVER. To promote long-lasting use and weather resistance, this 4-pole trailer lighting wire harness comes with a rubber dust cover. It easily fits onto the 4-way flat connector when not in use, protecting it against the outdoor elements

name: 22FT 4 Pin 5 Wire Trailer Wiring Harness Protected by Nylon Net Tube, Utility Pure Copper Boat Trailer Wiring Kit for Trailer Tail Light Rewiring, Waterproof 4 Pin 5 Wire Trailer Connector
short_description: RELIABLE AND SAFE: The 4-Pin Flat 5-Wire Harness Kit is made of thick PVC-coated wire material that resists corrosion, and the plug cover keeps dirt and water out when not in use. The 18AWG pure copper wire has excellent conductivity and is protected by black nylon mesh tubing. You can rest easy in all weather, in all environments.

EASY INSTALLATION: The 4-pin 5-wire trailer wiring harness adapter features a forked design that eliminates the need for splicing and greatly simplifies the wiring process, and the colour-coded labels on the harness and the included guide will help you to wire your trailer with ease, just like a professional electrician.

THE RIGHT SIZE: 22 feet of 4-pin, 5-conductor flat cable and 2.5 feet of ground wire provide enough length to easily rewire tail lights on RVs, trucks, boats, snowmobiles and other utility trailers. It is ideal for trailers under or over 80 inches wide.

VERSATILE APPLICATIONS: Designed to mate with industry standard 4-way flat sockets, the 4-Pin 5-Wire Trailer Connector Replacement provides your trailer with a male connector that can be used to replace frayed or broken wires on a variety of trailers.
WHAT YOU GET：A reliable wiring solution for trailer lights-4 Pin Flat 5 Wiring Harness Kit
